Package marksmgmtsystem

Class Student

java.lang.Object
marksmgmtsystem.Student
Direct Known Subclasses:
GraduateStudent, UndergraduateStudent
class Student extends Object
Represents a student in the Marks Management application. This class holds basic student information and their marks in specific courses.

    • Student

      public Student(String studentId, String studentName)
      Constructor for the Student class. Initializes a new student with default marks set to 0.0.

      studentName - Name of the student.

    • toString

      public String toString()
